About Suman Kumar

An Embedded Systems engineer with extensive hands-on experience in building systems, developing low-level software covering board bring-up, Linux kernel device drivers for CE and Medical Products. - Experienced creating real-time multi-threaded software and systems design. - Worked on Qualcomm Snapdragon APQ8064, APQ8084, APQ8016, APQ8096 and Freescale i.MX6 chipsets. -
